validation.validation:
The following Subgroup Organizations are not allowed for the Subgroup Organization Type entered: 
[SGOs not allowed]
If Apply Weekly Overtime is set to true then Weekly Overtime Threshold is required. If Apply Weekly Overtime is set to false then Weekly Overtime Threshold should be blank.
If either Apply Daily Overtime or Apply Weekly Overtime are set to true then Overtime Rate is required. If both are set to false then Overtime Rate should be blank.
If Apply Daily Overtime is set to true then Daily Overtime Threshold is required. If Apply Daily Overtime is set to false then Daily Overtime Threshold should be blank.
The selected Location does not have a Currency. Please select a Location with a Currency.
The selected Location does not have a Time Zone. Please select a Location with a Time Zone.

Solver_Penalty_Weight_Setting_WS.description: The schedule objective (Examples: Consistency, Labor Cost Minimization).
Numerical value between 0-100. Determines the default slider positions on the schedule.

validation.validation: [settingType] must be no more than 100.
validation.description: You must specify a numerical value between 0-100.

Solver_Penalty_Weight_Setting_WS.description: True when slider settings are locked so that schedulers can’t adjust them.

Solver_Penalty_Weight_Settings_Details__.description: The values you select for each of the Scheduling Engine settings to meet schedule objectives.
Allow to exceed maximum weekly hours
Enable fewer than minimum rest days
Allow fewer than minimum rest days

validation.validation: Consistency Look Back Cycle represents number of weeks. Select either 1 or 2.

If Enable Fewer than Minimum Rest Days is set to true then Allow Fewer than Minimum Rest Days is required. If Enable Fewer than Minimum Rest Days is set to false then Allow Fewer than Minimum Rest Days should be blank.

If Enable Exceed Maximum Weekly Hours is set to true then Allow to Exceed Maximum Weekly Hours is required. If Enable Exceed Maximum Weekly Hours is set to false then Allow to Exceed Maximum Weekly Hours should be blank.

Scheduling_Organization_Manager_Configur.description: Specify True to enable managers to manually create schedules when generating a schedule that has no labor demand populated.
Specify True to allow managers to copy a schedule from a prior week into the current week. Copies all shifts, assignments, and details.
Specify true to show sales and productivity modal icon.
Specify true to show sales forecast on the labor demand page.
Specify true to show labor budget on the labor demand page.
Specify true to show gaps in coverage on the default weekly view.
Specify true to show shift notes on the default weekly view.
Specify true to show meals on the default weekly view.
Specify true to show breaks on the default weekly view.
Specify true to show worker availability on the default weekly view.
Specify true to show gaps in coverage on the default daily view.
Specify true to show shift notes on the default daily view.
Specify true to show meals on the default daily view.
Specify true to show breaks on the default daily view.
Specify the default start time for the daily view.

Scheduling_Organization_Worker_Configura.description: Allow Workers to Cover Overlapping Shifts
Specify True to enable workers to view the published schedules of other workers in their scheduling organizations.
Specify the number of days in the past for which a worker can view their team's schedule. Example: The worker can't view their team's schedules that are more than 7 days in the past.

validation.validation: The ID must be for a High Level Scheduling Organization.
